text: Egha a uan otarim mɨsoghezɨ an areme, ezɨ an ofan bar isia mɨghɨrimɨn mɨn a tuazɨ a bar isia mɨghɨri. Egha a uabɨn akuraghasa ariaghirezir gumazamizibar duabar diava, egha uaghan uabɨn akurvaghasa kukunir gumazibar azai, egha akavsiar igharagha garir avɨribagh ami. Manase arazir kurar avɨriba Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn dagh ami, ezɨ an arazir kurar kaba Ikiavɨra Itir God gamizɨ, a bar anɨngaghe.
